name: ＳＰＯＯＫＹ ＳＥＬＦＩＥ
description:
All the art was free from the unity store/turbosquid. Music by Kevin Macleod, Andrew Gold.


ｔａｋｅ ｓｏｍｅ ＳＰＯＯＫＹ ＳＥＬＦＩＥＳ～

Arrow Keys/WASD/ZQSD to move. Left click to selfie. Right click to change spoopy ambience. Escape button to remove cursor lock.

(now comes with unity desktop build if the web build is too slow/annoying. Alt+F4 to escape desktop build.)

<3 Enjoy, @brendengibbons
